scripts.clean-results: rm -rf reports/ && rm -rf cypress/reports/ && rm -rf allure-results
scripts.specs: npx cypress run --record --key d5c4e048-0e4b-4276-a769-591a08e5325a --group 2x-chrome --parallel --ci-build-id test2 --spec "cypress/integration/features/scenarios/*.feature" --browser chrome
scripts.tags: npm run clean-results; npx cypress run --spec "cypress/integration/features/scenarios/*.feature" --env "TAGS=@home" --browser chrome; npm run merge-report; npm run generate-report;
scripts.allure-report: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.test:helm: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@regression or @smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/helm/*.feature";
scripts.test:pipeline: cypress run -b firefox --env TAGS='@regression or @smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/pipelines/*.feature";
scripts.test:addFlow: cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@regression or @smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/addFlow/*.feature";
scripts.test: npm run clean-results; npm run test:addFlow; npm run test:pipeline; npm run test:knative; npm run test:helm; npm run test:topology
scripts.cypress: npm run clean-results; cypress run -b chrome --env TAGS='@smoke and not @manual' -r mocha-allure-reporter --spec "features/*/*.feature"; npm run merge-report; npm run generate-report
